learning_objective: Store, copy, search, retrieve, modify, and delete information using a computing device and define the information stored as data.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex is a big fan of soccer and they follow multiple international soccer leagues. They have compiled a database where they store team names, player names, player's goals, and assists. Alex wants to retrieve a list of players who have over 10 goals and over 10 assists. Which of the following commands will help Alex retrieve such player data?",
    "Answer1": "SELECT player_name FROM soccer_table WHERE goals>10 AND assists>10;",
    "Answer2": "SELECT player_name FROM soccer_table WHERE goals=10 AND assists=10;",
    "Answer3": "SELECT player_name FROM soccer_table WHERE goals<10 OR assists<10;",
    "Answer4": "SELECT player_name FROM soccer_table WHERE goals>=10 AND assists>=10;",
    "CorrectAnswer": "1",
    "Explanation": "The SQL statement in Answer 1 is correct. When we want to retrieve data based on more than one condition, we can use the AND / OR clauses. Answer 1 will retrieve players who have scored more than 10 goals and have more than 10 assists."
}
